name: moofarm.io online multiplayer
description:
Welcome to the exciting multiplayer game moofarm io, in which you need to survive on the farm and fight with other real players from around the world.

Zombies around the world are attacking, defend their homes.
The game is made in the best traditions of io games, and you will like it.
To survive in moofarm io, you need to build farms, improve your defenses, plant animals, create clans, survive the night without allowing zombies to break through and destroy you, as well as defend themselves from other players.

Get resources, gold, wood, stone and more.
Defend yourself and destroy all enemies in order to get the maximum result for the game and you will become the leader.
Set the mill to protect it and grab the territory until it becomes your online opponent, because it also brings points.

We wish you a pleasant game!

Follow the news on social networks.
facebook: https://www.facebook.com/moofarmio/
twitter: https://twitter.com/moofarmio/
vkontakte: https://vk.com/moofarm/
